title: Digital Marketing, social Media, email and calendar management
job_overview:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and creative professional to join our team as a Digital Marketing, Social Media, and Email, This role is ideal for a self-motivated individual with strong organizational skills, a solid grasp of digital marketing strategies, and the ability to manage multiple communication and scheduling platforms. The ideal candidate will play a vital role in enhancing our digital presence, engaging with our audience, managing internal and external communications, 

Key Responsibilities:
Digital Marketing & Social Media
Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns to support business goals.

Manage content creation and posting across all social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).

Analyze performance metrics and adjust strategies to improve engagement and reach.

Stay up to date with digital trends, platform updates, and competitor strategies.
 
Email Marketing
Create and manage email marketing campaigns, newsletters, and automated sequences.

Manage event planning tasks, including digital webinars or in-person engagements.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in digital marketing and social media management.

Proficiency with platforms like Meta Business Suite, Facebook/IG, and TikTok, Canva, Mailchimp/ConvertKit, 

Strong written and verbal communication skills.

Excellent time management and organizational skills.

Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks efficiently.

Familiarity with SEO and analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Facebook/IG Insights) 

Preferred Skills:
Basic graphic design and copywriting skills.

Experience in email automation tools and CRM systems.

Background in healthcare, wellness, or service-based industries is a plus.
